live_updates: This issue has been resolved, Thank you for your patience.
Technicians have been dispatched to investigate this issue.
We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
31016.summary: Some customers in the Highlands area of Victoria are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
31016.title: Dec 26 - Victoria (Highlands) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
